title: 3:21 - The Shortest Game Ever

embed.description: Support us by wearing our stylish gamer apparel: http://thatisop.spreadshirt.com/ Music: http://audiojungle.net/item/fast-dream-electro/6159561 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThatIsOP Think you can beat that? Submit your scenario in the comments.

body:
Hey guys! 

My friends and I just attempted to break the world record for the shortest game ever! We tried it with the the biggest DPS output team (Olaf, Tristana, 

Considering the new outer tower buff (block 30 regular attack damage), we had to optimize for AD, then attack speed.

We tried multiple combinations, including team comps built around nasus and heimerdinger. This is the video from our most succesful attempt. 

Any ideas on how to improve it?

Thanks,

Phil

replies.body:
Alright, now that we got that out of the way.

I wonder what the absolute longest League game would be like...
"This is beginning to look like a game between SKT1 and a challenger team from Venezuela" - I lol'ed.
